techniques.name: FVG Entry
rules: Identificer FVG paa M15 eller hoejere
Vent paa price return til FVG zone
Stop under FVG for long, over for short

techniques.name: Order Block Entry
rules: Find OB fra sidste impulse move
Vent paa foerste touch af OB

techniques.name: BOS Retest Entry
rules: Vent paa retest af broken level

techniques.name: Round Number Bounce
rules: Vent paa rejection candle (pin bar, engulfing)
